name: ShadowLens
description:
ShadowLens is a found footage video game that was released in 2000. I obtained the original game and converted it to Unreal Engine for you to play. There is a lot of unused content in the game files that still need to be restored. Along with the game I've found multiple tapes that recorded gameplay. You can find them on my website https://shadowlens.weebly.com/

The back of the game case reads

"Shadows lurk in the dark. Use the camera to navigate unlit spaces. Find your missing daughter and discover what happened to her. Find tools to help unlock new areas to explore. Don't die."

Let me know if you discover anything within the game or anything to do with the lost tapes
